snippet: A year ago, Sling Media, a subsidiary of EchoStar, introduced a nifty application for the Apple iPhone that allowed users with a Slingbox at home to watch and control their home television signal from their handsets.     The only problem was that ...
abstract: AT&T will allow use of SlingPlayer iPhone app, application which allows owners of Slingbox to watch and control home television signal from handset, over its 3G network; had suffered criticism over banning application due to fear of bandwidth consumption (M)
